English.Text: Your men hesitate a second too long, and the pirates have made up the distance between the ships. Now they have been allowed aboard they have the upper hand and are soon on top of your crew, binding them and maiming those who resist. When the hurly-burly's done, the pirates prop your bound survivors against each other as they trawl the ship for goodies, before they wish you "fair winds", and depart, cackling with glee.
